availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Hartigan (Caldwell co., ky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married Amanda Ann Robertson Hartigan in Trigg County, Kentucky, on December 24, 1855. Father of John Hartigan and Julia Hartigan. Collier in Dickson County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Long Pond, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Dickson County, Middle District, p. 137B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Long Pond, p. 11.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trigg County Marriages, Film #000321335, p. 171.
"James H. Hartigan (1815-1875)," Find A Grave, Memorial #116056712, accessed April 13, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/116056712.
